description: Complement and reverse the order of all but the most significant bit in binary expansion of n. n = 1ab..yz -> 1ZY..BA = a(n), where A=1-a, B=1-b,...
comments: A self-inverse permutation. Also a(n) = A054429(A059893(n)) = A059893(A054429(n)).
links: Harry J. Smith and Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8191 (first 1024 terms from Harry J. Smith)
maple: a:= proc(n) local i, m, r; m, r:= n, 0;      for i from 0 while m>1 do r:= 2*r +1 -irem(m,2,'m') od;      r +2^i    end:seq(a(n), n=1..100);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 28 2015
prog: (PARI)a(n)=local(v, l); v=binary(n); l=length(v); 2^(l-1)+sum(k=0, l-2, if(!v[k+2], 2^k))log2(n) = log(n)/log(2)b(n)=if(n<2, 1, if(n%2==0, b(n/2)+2^(floor(log2(n/2))+1), b((n-1)/2)+2^floor(log2((n-1)/2))))(PARI){ for (n=1, 1024, a=1; b=n; while (b>1, a=2*a + 1 - 2*frac(b/2); b=floor(b/2); ); write("b059894.txt", n, " ", a); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 30 2009
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 06 2001
